ProjectTitle: Lipids: hitherto unknown mediators of cartilage homeostasis and disease with a role in osteoarthritis
InitialFeedbackHistory:
13/07/2023
Since your research is funded by FWO, they expect you to write the data management plan using the Flemish Standard Data Management Plan template (a new template since October 2022). It is best to convert your DMP now to this template. You will see that the template asks for a more detailed description of your data types.
DMP Guidance here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp

For data sharing you can now use KU Leuven RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
Zolondo is not an existing repository (Zenodo is).
label: good with suggestions
